column1: Smoque BBQ////You can't get anything bad at this place. And their ordering system is efficient. Order and then get seated. Weekend lines can get long but it moves relatively fast. Love their brisket
column4: though I usually get the brisket. Their fries are crunchy
column5: the mac and cheese is so rich it hurts your chest if you eat it too fast
column6: and their cole slaw has that brightness tang to cut through all the heaviness of the other foods. Solid place
